name: spunky
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
energetic, confident, and determined: They adopted a spunky 5-year-old girl called Emma. She’s spunky and sarcastic when she can get away with it and respectful when she can’t.
Australian English used to describe a man who is sexually attractive: I saw this spunky guy walking towards me.
More examplesFewer examplesShe is kind but spunky.The dog's spunky attitude matched that of its owner.Did you ever hear from that spunky guy?
